title: Summary - Hurricane Otis (EP3/EP182023)
author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary:
...OTIS MOVING FARTHER INLAND... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
 As of 10:00 AM CDT Wed Oct 25
 the center of Otis was located near 18.2, -100.6
 with movement NNW at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 980 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
